doc.title: American Beauties: In Pursuit of Art
doc.plot: SpaceOnSpurgeon presents the vision of five talented artists: Patrick Maisano, Michael Maas, Mark Vallen, Gregg Stone, and Emigdio Vasquez. In the spirit of Sundance Channel's Iconoclasts and IFC's Dinner for Five, these artists are brought together at the SpaceOnSpurgeon gallery in Santa Ana, California, to discuss their work, influences, and their views, often controversial, on today's contemporary art scene.
